page.title: 07BISHOP SUTTON VILLAGE
page.content: With a population of nearly 1100 people, Bishop Sutton has facilities for all age groups.Sports activities include cricket,football & tennis and bowls are available nearby. An enthusiastic Theatre Group regularly stages productions in the Village Hall & a Music Hall type of entertainment is provided annually in the car park of the Red Lion Inn.Other events are regularly held in the Methodist & Village Halls.A skittle Club meets in the British Legion Hall.The Chapel has its choir and concerts are held frequently. The Senior Citizens have their Silver Lining Club, there are Ladies and Mens Forums, a Womens Institute and Senior and Junior Red Cross Clubs.For the younger generation there are Girl Guides & Brownies and a Youth Club.There is a village School & pre school play group.
